content: *perfect for halloween treats and candy or just for fun the rest of the year lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 70461ad skill level easy + level 3 lion® wool article #820 4 colors 316 yards black 158 yards each rose dark teal pearl gray *ed note if you are substituting another yarn it must be 100% feltable wool if you plan to felt the project * crochet hook - size k-10 5 6 5 mm assemble pieces and embroider details after felting see also 70462ad felted candy corn bag 1 *free registration at site required to access patterns * 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-candy-corn-bag
